entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 a.m. PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 4.8Â°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 40%
